snippet.title: Citystate II - Official Gameplay Trailer: Update 1.4
snippet.description:
50% OFF UNTIL JULY 7, now is the best time to try it out!
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1352850/Citystate_II/

Citystate II is a modern city builder featuring political customization, social classes, mixed use buildings, slums, riots and more. A complex and realistic simulation game, more along the lines of SimCity 4 than of Cities Skylines. Citystate II received 6 major updates since its release a year ago, now is the best time to try it out!
